```{=html}
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="hu">
<head>
  <meta charset="UTF-8">
  <title>Anna Zambó | Végleges verzió</title>
  <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">

  <!-- Fontok és ikonok -->
  <link href="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Dancing+Script:wght@700&family=Lato:wght@400;700&display=swap" rel="stylesheet">
  <link rel="stylesheet" href="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/font-awesome/6.5.0/css/all.min.css" integrity="sha512-yGySnYY3Ls/1LrWjJzkSnBkf6JKztU5kXxqR1F5MEqNN5mQZkDGL7bZ9IuGqA57qKJ+khGmIwJAFSC8e2QVDaQ==" crossorigin="anonymous" referrerpolicy="no-referrer" />

  <style>
    :root {
      --pink: #ffafaf;
      --blue: #88cfff;
      --lightblue: #82CAFF;
      --blue-hover: #5fb3dd;
      --linkedin-blue: #0077B5;
      --shadow-glass: 0 8px 32px 0 rgba(31, 38, 135, 0.1);
      --shadow-btn: 0 4px 15px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.08);
      --border-radius-main: 24px;
    }

    body {
      margin: 0;
      font-family: 'Lato', sans-serif;
      background-color: #fff;
      background-image:
        radial-gradient(circle, var(--pink) 2.5px, transparent 2.5px),
        radial-gradient(circle, var(--blue) 2.5px, transparent 2.5px);
      background-size: 40px 40px;
      background-position: 0 0, 20px 20px;
      color: #222;
    }

    .container {
      max-width: 1000px;
      margin: 0 auto;
      padding: 0 20px;
    }

    .hero {
      display: flex;
      flex-direction: column;
      align-items: center;
      padding: 100px 20px 60px;
      text-align: center;
      margin: 0;
      overflow: hidden;
      position: relative;
    }

    .profile-img {
      width: 100%;
      max-width: 500px;
      height: auto;
      border-radius: 16px;
      border: 6px solid var(--blue);
      object-fit: cover;
      box-shadow: 0 10px 25px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.15);
      margin-bottom: 30px;
      transition: transform 0.5s cubic-bezier(0.2, 0.8, 0.2, 1), box-shadow 0.5s cubic-bezier(0.2, 0.8, 0.2, 1);
    }

    .profile-img:hover {
      transform: scale(1.03);
      box-shadow: 0 18px 45px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.25);
    }

    .headline {
      font-family: 'Dancing Script', cursive;
      font-size: 56px;
      font-weight: 700;
      color: #2c3e50;
      margin-bottom: 15px;
      text-shadow: 2px 2px 4px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.05);
    }

    .intro-text {
      font-size: 18px;
      font-weight: 400;
      color: #555;
      max-width: 600px;
      margin: 0 auto 40px;
      line-height: 1.6;
    }

    .buttons {
      display: flex;
      flex-wrap: wrap;
      gap: 16px;
      justify-content: center;
    }

    .btn {
      padding: 14px 32px;
      border-radius: 30px;
      font-size: 16px;
      font-weight: 700;
      text-decoration: none;
      color: white;
      transition: all 0.3s cubic-bezier(0.25, 0.46, 0.45, 0.94);
      white-space: nowrap;
      box-shadow: var(--shadow-btn);
      display: inline-flex;
      align-items: center;
      justify-content: center;
    }

    .btn i {
      margin-right: 8px;
      font-size: 18px;
    }

    .btn, .btn:visited, .btn:hover, .btn:active, .btn:focus {
      color: white !important;
    }

    .btn:hover {
      transform: translateY(-5px);
      box-shadow: 0 12px 25px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.15);
    }

    .blog-btn {
      background-color: var(--lightblue);
    }

    .blog-btn:hover {
      background-color: var(--blue-hover);
      color: white !important;
    }

    .cv-btn {
      background-color: var(--blue);
    }

    .cv-btn:hover {
      background-color: #66b2e1;
    }

    .linkedin-btn {
      background-color: var(--linkedin-blue);
    }

    .linkedin-btn:hover {
      background-color: #005f93;
    }

    .skills {
      text-align: center;
      margin: 60px auto 40px;
      max-width: 900px;
    }

    .skills h2 {
      font-family: 'Dancing Script', cursive;
      font-size: 44px;
      font-weight: 700;
      color: #2c3e50;
      margin-bottom: 24px;
      text-shadow: 1px 1px 2px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.05);
    }

    .skills-list {
      display: flex;
      flex-wrap: wrap;
      justify-content: center;
      gap: 14px;
    }

    .skills-list span {
      background-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.9);
      padding: 12px 24px;
      border-radius: 24px;
      box-shadow: var(--shadow-glass);
      transition: all 0.3s ease-in-out;
      cursor: pointer;
      font-size: 15px;
      font-weight: 700;
      color: #444;
    }

    .skills-list span:hover {
      transform: scale(1.05);
      background-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 1);
      box-shadow: 0 0 0 3px var(--blue), var(--shadow-btn);
    }

    .hobbies {
      text-align: center;
      margin: 60px auto 40px;
      max-width: 900px;
    }

    .hobbies h2 {
      font-family: 'Dancing Script', cursive;
      font-size: 44px;
      font-weight: 700;
      color: #2c3e50;
      margin-bottom: 24px;
      text-shadow: 1px 1px 2px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.05);
    }

    .hobby-grid {
      display: flex;
      justify-content: center;
      flex-wrap: wrap;
      gap: 20px;
    }

    .hobby-item {
      background-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.9);
      padding: 20px;
      border-radius: var(--border-radius-main);
      box-shadow: var(--shadow-glass);
      transition: transform 0.3s ease, box-shadow 0.3s ease;
      width: 250px;
      display: flex;
      flex-direction: column;
      justify-content: space-between;
    }

    .hobby-item:hover {
      transform: translateY(-8px);
      box-shadow: 0 12px 30px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
    }

    .hobby-item .img-wrapper {
      width: 100%;
      height: 200px;
      overflow: hidden;
      border-radius: 12px;
      margin-bottom: 15px;
    }

    .hobby-item img {
      width: 100%;
      height: 100%;
      object-fit: cover;
    }

    .hobby-item p {
      font-size: 16px;
      font-weight: 600;
      color: #444;
      margin: 0;
    }

    footer {
      text-align: center;
      font-size: 13px;
      margin: 50px auto 30px;
      color: #aaa;
    }

    @media (max-width: 768px) {
      .hero {
        padding: 60px 15px 30px;
        margin: 0 0;
      }

      .headline {
        font-size: 42px;
      }

      .profile-img {
        max-width: 300px;
      }

      .intro-text {
        font-size: 16px;
      }

      .btn {
        font-size: 15px;
        padding: 12px 24px;
      }

      .buttons {
        flex-direction: column;
        align-items: stretch;
      }

      .skills h2, .hobbies h2 {
        font-size: 36px;
      }

      .skills-list span {
        font-size: 14px;
        padding: 10px 20px;
      }
    }
  </style>
</head>
<body>

<main class="container">
  <section class="hero">
    <img src="images/annaz.jpeg" alt="Anna Zambó" class="profile-img">
    <h1 class="headline">Hello, I'm Anna</h1>
    <p class="intro-text">
      I am passionate about strategic communication, sustainability, and the digital world, with a special interest in new technologies, artificial intelligence, and meaningful design. I consider myself a creative and open-minded person, always eager to learn and explore new things.
    </p>
    <p class="intro-text">
      That’s why I decided to start this blog — to reflect on the topics that inspire me, share insights, and document my learning journey at the intersection of communication, innovation, and design in the age of emerging technologies.
    </p>

    <div class="buttons">
      <a href="projects.qmd" class="btn blog-btn">Visit the Blog</a>
      <a href="https://www.linkedin.com/in/anna-zambo-059970230" class="btn linkedin-btn" target="_blank">
  <img src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/simple-icons/simple-icons/icons/linkedin.svg" alt="LinkedIn icon" style="width: 20px; height: 20px; filter: invert(1); margin-right: 8px; vertical-align: middle;">
  LinkedIn
</a>


    </div>
  </section>

  <section class="skills">
    <h2>My Skills</h2>
    <div class="skills-list">
      <span>Prompt Engineering</span>
      <span>AI Tools</span>
      <span>R & RStudio</span>
      <span>Web Design</span>
      <span>Sustainability Communication</span>
      <span>WordPress & Canva</span>
      <span>Digital Trends & Futures Thinking</span>
      <span>SQL Basics</span>
    </div>
  </section>

  <section class="hobbies">
    <h2>My Hobbies</h2>
    <div class="hobby-grid">
      <div class="hobby-item">
        <div class="img-wrapper">
          <img src="images/climbing.jpeg" alt="Bouldering">
        </div>
        <p>Bouldering</p>
      </div>
      <div class="hobby-item">
        <div class="img-wrapper">
          <img src="images/drawing2.jpeg" alt="Drawing">
        </div>
        <p>Drawing</p>
      </div>
      <div class="hobby-item">
        <div class="img-wrapper">
          <img src="images/concert.jpeg" alt="Concerts">
        </div>
        <p>Concerts</p>
      </div>
    </div>
  </section>
</main>

<footer>
  Created by Anna Zambó © 2025
</footer>

</body>
</html>


```
